```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)

url <- "https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus/"
html <- url %>% read_html

corona_table <- html %>%
  html_node(".main_table_countries_div") %>%
  html_table

str(corona_table)
corona_table
corona_table[1] <- list(NULL)
corona_table
corona_table <- corona_table[-1:-8,]

print(corona_table)

```

```{r}
ggplot2::ggplot()
ggplot(data = corona_table) +
  geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = Country.Other, y = TotalCases), stat = "identity")
```
